mapper.select: SELECT site_srl ,site_nm FROM site_info ORDER BY site_nm

SELECT count(1) FROM site_info si, site_link sl WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl
AND si.site_nm like '%' #{searchString} '%'

SELECT sl.link_srl , sl.site_srl , si.site_nm , sl.link_cd , sl.link_nm , sl.link_url , sl.link_cls , sl.link_mtd_lst , sl.link_mtd_cts , sl.link_cnt , sl.batch_itv , sl.use_yn , sl.reg_dt , sl.exc_dt FROM site_info si, site_link sl WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl
AND si.site_nm like '%' #{searchString} '%'
ORDER BY site_nm ASC, link_srl DESC
LIMIT #{rowStart}, #{rowSize}

SELECT sl.link_srl , sl.site_srl , si.site_nm , sl.link_cd , sl.link_nm , sl.link_url , sl.link_cls , sl.link_mtd_lst , sl.link_mtd_cts , sl.link_cnt , sl.batch_itv , sl.use_yn , sl.reg_dt , sl.upt_dt , sl.exc_dt FROM site_info si, site_link sl WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = #{linkSrl}
